definitions.definition: A tiny freshwater fish, Poecilia reticulata , popular in home aquariums, that usually has a plain body and black or dark blue tail for the females and a more colorful tail for the males. The guppies can vary in size, but males are 4 cm (1.6”) and females are 7 cm (2.8”).
examples: Fred kept a tank of guppies by the windowsill.
Throw that one back; it’s just a guppy !

definitions.definition: A tube holding paintballs before they are loaded into the gun.
A hold across the palm of the hand rather than the fingertips .

main_definition: A tiny freshwater fish, Poecilia reticulata , popular in home aquariums, that usually has a plain body and black or dark blue tail for the females and a more colorful tail for the males. The guppies can vary in size, but males are 4 cm (1.6”) and females are 7 cm (2.8”).
secondary_definitions: ( paintball ) A tube holding paintballs before they are loaded into the gun.
( climbing ) A hold across the palm of the hand rather than the fingertips .
